useCase.name: Generate Comprehensive Statistics Report
useCase.description: As an Administrator, I want to view detailed statistics about faculty work for better tracking and analysis.

preconditions.precondition: Administrator is logged into the system.

mainSequence.step: Admin UI fetches statistics from the Backend System.
Backend System retrieves comprehensive stats from the Statistics Module.
Statistics Module queries faculty work data from the Database.
Database returns the queried data to the Statistics Module.
Statistics Module processes the data into statistics.
Backend System generates a digestible report using the Report Generation Service.
Report Generation Service returns the generated report to Backend System.
Backend System displays the report on the Admin UI.
Admin UI shows the comprehensive tracking statistics to the Administrator.
